attributes.action: publish in detail the expenses of the Royal Family
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's not clear how exactly the Royal Family spend taxpayers' money. Publishing the Royal Family's expenses in detail might dispel the notion that they are freeloaders by showing what good value for money they are.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
